pages.text: 68|16|Yagate ware wa, hana no ue ni yakiin o osudearou.
68|17|Hontōni ware wa,(kaju)-en no mochinushi o kokoromita yō ni, kare-ra o kokoromita. Kare-ra ga, sōchō ni sore (kudamono) o shūkaku suru koto o chikatta toki ni,
68|18|(arrā no o nozominaraba) to, jōken o tsukeru koto o shinakatta.
68|19|Sore de kare-ra ga nemutte iru ma ni, anata no nushi kara no tenbatsu ga sore o osotta.
68|20|Sorede asa ni wa, sore wa tsumitora reta yō ni natta.
68|21|Sōchō kare-ra wa tagaini sakenda.
68|22|`Moshi shūkaku suru nonara anata gata no hata ni isogimashou.'
68|23|Sokode kare-ra wa tei koe ni sasayaki atte dekaketa.
68|24|`Kyō wa hitori no binbōnin mo, ano (kaju-en) ni haira sete wa narimasen.'
68|25|Kare-ra wa tsuyoku kokoro ni kimete, asa hayaku deteitta.
68|26|Daga kare-ra ga sore o mita toki, itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, michi o machigaete iru.
68|27|Iya, watashi-tachi wa (shūkaku-mono o) ubawareta.'
68|28|Kare-ra no naka, sukoshi odayakana hitori ga itta. `Anata gata wa dōshite (omo o) tataenai no ka to, watashi ga itta no ni.'
68|29|Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi no omo o tataeru. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa fugidearimashita.' To itta.
68|30|Soko de kare-ra wa, tagaini semeai hajimeta.
68|31|Kare-ra wa itta. `Ā kanashī, watashi-tachi wa hontōni ōheideshita.
68|32|Omo wa kore ni kawaru, sara ni yoi (kaju-en) o atae rareru kamo shirenai. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa,(kaigo shite) omo ni tangan shimasu.'
68|33|Kono yōna mono ga,(gense no) chōbatsudearu. Daga raise no chōbatsu wa sarani ōkina monodearu. Moshi kare-ra ni wakatte itanaraba.
68|34|Hontōni arrā o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-nushi no omoto ni ki kobi no rakuen ga arou.
68|35|Ware wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi o, tsumibito no yō ni atsukau to demo iu no ka.
68|36|Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Anata gata wa dō handan suru no ka.
68|37|Soretomo anata gata ni wa, manabu ni tariru Keisuke ga aru no ka.
68|38|Anata gata ga erabu mono wa, nani demo sono Keisuke no naka ni aru no ka.
68|39|Soretomo anata gata wa, shinpan no hi made yūkōna seiyaku o wareto musunda no ka. Anata gataga shiryobunbetsu suru koto wa, tashikani anata gata no mono ni naru no ka.
68|40|(Muhanmado yo) kare-ra ni toe. `Kare-ra no dare ga sore o hoshō suru nodesu ka.'
68|41|Matawa, kare-ra wa (omoni) haisuru mono ga aru no ka. Kare-ra ga tadashī nonara, sono haisuru mono o tsurete kitasa se nasai.
68|42|Sune ga, gen wa ni sa reru hi (o omoi nasai). Kare-ra wa sajida suru yō motome rareru. Daga kare-ra ni wa dekinaidearou.
